name: Traveling Doctor
flower_description: A precious medicinal ingredient that has lost all medicinal value after years in storage.
feather_description: The durable feather of an owl. Emblematic of nocturnal supremacy, it gave some encouragement to the Traveling Doctor when venturing out to visit patients late at night.
sand_description: A precise instrument used for keeping time. For a doctor, every second counts.
goblet_description: This pot used to carry concentrated and extremely potent concoctions. It is now empty, but still gives off a strong smell of medicine.
circlet_description: Used to tie back the doctor's hair when treating patients. Can also be used as a sling for sprains and broken arms in emergencies.
